ComicInfo.Summary:
In the third issue of the Bob’s Burgers Comic Book, we bring you more titillating tales from the Belchers! Louise discovers the wondrous wonders of the ride that stops time; Genederella is given a chance to attend a Joyous Jam Jamboree with the help of a special fairy; Tina brings us on a super-spy adventure to sabotage an evil villain; Bob’s imagination drives his latest Fantasy Food Truck; and Linda tries again to take a nice family photo in front of the restaurant.
Story TitlesTIna's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: The Spy Who Lived and Let DanceBob's Fantasy Food Truck Concept Art: Fire Truck Food TruckLouise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities: The Ride, Part 2Linda's Attempt To Take A Nice Family Picture In Front of the Restaurant (And How It Always Goes Wrong) #123Gene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: Genederella, Part I*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Anthony Aguinaldo | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Paul Claerhout | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Anthony Aguinaldo | 3 | D/RE | ComicXposure Exclusive Variant Cover | Frank Forte | 4 | E/RE | Geek Fuel Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-29 20:24:06. [CVDB499051]

ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Aguinaldo, Hector Reynoso, Marcelo Benavides, Mike Guerena, Steven Theis, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Anthony Aguinaldo, Frank Forte, Paul Claerhout
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Belcher, Calvin Fischoeder, Gene Belcher, Jimmy Pesto Jr., Jocelyn, Linda Belcher, Logan Bush, Louise Belcher, Mickey , Mr. Frond, Tammy Larsen, Teddy, Tina Belcher, Zeke
